statements: UPDATE email_campaign_data SET email_recipients = 5000, click_through_rate = 0.15 WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE email_campaign_data SET conversion_rate = 0.2, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 102;
UPDATE email_campaign_data SET click_through_rate = 0.1, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE campaign_id = 100;
UPDATE email_campaign_data SET start_date = '2022-08-15', end_date = '2022-12-31', email_recipients = 5000 WHERE campaign_name = 'Holiday Offer';
UPDATE email_campaigns SET total_clicks = 500, total_conversions = 50 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_emails SET email_opened = true, conversion_timestamp = '2022-01-30 10:20:00' WHERE email_id = 10;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET total_clicks = total_clicks + 1 WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
UPDATE campaign_emails SET click_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', email_opened = TRUE WHERE email_id = 2001;
UPDATE Campaign SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign', start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Subscriber SET last_name = 'Doe', email = 'janedoe@example.com' WHERE subscriber_id = 3;
UPDATE Campaign SET campaign_type='New Campaign Type' WHERE campaign_id=1
UPDATE CampaignStats SET open_rate=0.75, click_rate=0.65, conversion_rate=0.5 WHERE stat_id=3
UPDATE campaigns SET open_rate = 0.75 WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
UPDATE recipients SET subscription_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE recipient_id = 2002;
UPDATE campaigns SET total_recipients = 5000, open_rate = 0.25 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE recipients SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE recipient_id = 3;
UPDATE Campaigns SET status = 'Inactive' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Contacts SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE contact_id = 5;
UPDATE Campaigns SET status='Active' WHERE campaign_id=1
